_comment: WARNING : THIS CONFIGURATION IS CASE SENSITIVE
This configuration block is responsible for holding user and model credentials.
You need to provide an API key for this to work and also provide which model of gemini
you want to use. You can also change the name of the model according to your own need.
You can also mention by what name do you want the model to address you.
Available MODEL_VERSION are listed below
-> text-embedding-004
-> gemini-1.0-pro
-> gemini-1.5-pro
-> gemini-1.5-flash
WARNING : THIS CONFIGURATION IS CASE SENSITIVE
you can set the design and color of the output in this block. you can also change text color
Various stylings for the colors are also provided. Available colors are listed below
-> Red & Bold Red                                                     -> Underline Red & Italic Red
-> White & Bold White                                                 -> Underline White & Italic White
-> Blue & Bold Blue                                                   -> Underline Blue & Italic Blue
-> Cyan & Bold Cyan                                                   -> Underline Cyan & Italic Cyan
-> Green & Bold Green                                                 -> Underline Green & Italic Green
-> Black & Bold Black                                                 -> Underline Black & Italic Black
-> Yellow & Bold Yellow                                               -> Underline Yellow & Italic Yellow
-> Purple & Bold Purple                                               -> Underline Purple & Italic Purple
-> Bold Underline Red & Bold Italic Red                               -> Underline Italic Red & Bold Underline Italic Red
-> Bold Underline White & Bold Italic White                           -> Underline Italic White & Bold Underline Italic White
-> Bold Underline Blue & Bold Italic Blue                             -> Underline Italic Blue & Bold Underline Italic Blue
-> Bold Underline Cyan & Bold Italic Cyan                             -> Underline Italic Cyan & Bold Underline Italic Cyan
-> Bold Underline Green & Bold Italic Green                           -> Underline Italic Green & Bold Underline Italic Green
-> Bold Underline Black & Bold Italic Black                           -> Underline Italic Black & Bold Underline Italic Black
-> Bold Underline Yellow & Bold Italic Yellow                         -> Underline Italic Yellow & Bold Underline Italic Yellow
-> Bold Underline Purple & Bold Italic Purple                         -> Underline Italic Purple & Bold Underline Italic Purple
WARNING : CHANGING THESE SETTINGS CAN AFFECT YOUR EXPERIENCE WITH THIS MODEL
WARNING : THIS CONFIGURATION IS CASE SENSITIVE
You can change safety settings here for the content that gemini processes for you provided prompt
Availble settings are listed below :
-> BLOCK_NONE
-> BLOCK_LOW_AND_ABOVE
-> BLOCK_MEDIUM_AND_ABOVE
-> BLOCK_ONLY_HIGH
-> HARM_BLOCK_THRESHOLD_UNSPECIFIED
